Publication Title: Development of a perfusable, hierarchical microvasculature-on-a-chip model
Publication Authors: Sophia W Chen, Adriana Blazeski, Shun Zhang, Sarah E Shelton, Giovanni S Offeddu, Roger D Kamm
Publication Abstract: Several methods have been developed for generating 3D, in vitro, organ-on-chip models of human vasculature to study vascular function, transport, and tissue engineering. However, many of these existing models lack the hierarchical nature of the arterial-to-capillary-to-venous architecture that is key to capturing a more comprehensive view of the human microvasculature.
